doc.field: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia

Stair location in Big House similar to New Shadwell--Stair Scroll Bracket similar to The Farm New & Mount Fair--Stair Spandrel Wave similar to Mount Fair--Arch with keystone similar to The Farm New & Estouteville--1764 Portico Columns same as ones in cellar of Clover Fields Big House--Still in the Meriwether family descendants to this day--I Buck, 1st Overseer; Powell. 2nd Overseer

Big House: 2 Story Frame w/1 Story Frame Wing, Nelson name brick, Paired Column Portico, Square Columns, 3 Bay, 2 Pile, Hipped Roof, Ridge Board from another house, Tapered Rafters with Reciprocating Saw Marks, Collar Beams and Roofing Boards with Reciprocating Saw Marks, 5 Course American Bond, 5 Course American with Flemish Bond, Bulkhead, Transom with Sidelights, 6 Panel Doors, 4 Panel Doors, 2 Panel Door, 2 Leaf Door, 6/6, Blinds, Metal Chain Fire Escape, Centered on Mountain Peak; 1846 Doctors Office (Sunset Cabin): 1 Story Log, Stone Chimney (could be 18th century)

Clarke, Master Carpenter, Apr-Nov 1848--McMullen and son William, Brickmasons--Allen Bacon, Carpenter--Davy Locker, Shingles--Carter, Terrell, Plasters--Keller, Painter; Tucker Isaacs, Painter & Glazier
survey data: Architecture in Virginia--Virginia Road Traces%Mutual Assurance Society Insurance Policy--Work Projects Administration
